job.title: Data Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description:
Job Title:&nbsp;Data EngineerPosition Type: Contract until December 2021 (2.5 Months)Location: 100% remote, no travel, prefer Central or East Coast location since a lot of the team onshore work East Coast. Primary Skills: 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure Python, Scala, SQL and/or Databricks hands on experience Requirements:   - At least 5+ years of developer/data engineer experience working specifically in Azure.   
  - Must have python, scala, SQL and/or databricks hands on experience.   
  - Should be independent worker but collaborate with necessary peers and deliver results incrementally by taking full ownership of tasks.   
&nbsp;Daily duties: 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gen 1 to Gen 2 transitiona)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Majority of their data pipelines are using Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 1 which is going to be deprecated by Microsoftb)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hence they need to migrate this to ADLS Gen 2 versionc)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Approximately, 155 data pipelines will be impacted from an ingestion pov and another 30 pipelines will also need to be updated in Refined data process   2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data Quality automationa)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Today, they have several notebooks and scripts that perform aggregate quality checks for multiple sourcesb)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Some of these need to be upgraded to use more current pipeline run information and also needs automationc)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;They will utilize ADLSg2 to store this metadata for reporting and analysis    3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Functions optimization and Vacuum implementationa)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There are Azure Functions based processes that needs update and optimization as each of them are running independentlyb)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Opportunity to modularize some of these functions and as a result reduce overhead on system resources&nbsp;
